影の薄い: (かげのうすい) - inconspicuous; unobtrusive; low profile

役する: (えきする) - to use; to employ
役だつ: (やくだつ) - to be useful; to be helpful; to serve the purpose

役に就く: (やくにつく) - to be appointed to a post; to assume office
役に就ける: (やくにつける) - to place someone in a position

役に立つ: (やくにたつ) - to be helpful; to be useful

役を干される: (やくをほされる) - to be deprived of one's role; to have one's livelihood taken away
役不足: (やくぶそく) - dissatisfaction with the work (role) given to one; feeling oneself above the given work (role)

役立てる: (やくだてる) - to put to use; to make use of; to turn to account
